name: Flyfect
description:
Welcome to the future. Thanks to The Box, E. Haitec is the only quadrillionaire in the world. However after getting bored of his status, he starts  to help people in the past. How? Thanks to his computer where he can see people in need and obviously The Box, which can send things to the past.  

Controls
WASD -> Movement
E -> Grab or drop things, focus on computer

Developers:

Atakan Ateş
Anıl Civil
Atılhan Dursunoğlu
Umut Mert Kuyupınar
